text: Parmentiera is a genus of plants in the family Bignoniaceae. Species include: * Parmentiera aculeata * Parmentiera cereifera * Parmentiera dressleri A.Gentry * Parmentiera morii A.Gentry * Parmentiera stenocarpa Dugand & L.B.Smith ==References== Category:Bignoniaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Parmentiera
